amendment.description: To control and alleviate the cormorant problem in the State of Michigan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2124 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2124 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14142) To control and alleviate the cormorant problem in the State of Michigan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2124 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2124 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Stabenow.
